formattedAddress: 1786 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1786 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: I can’t thank this office enough for all their help in providing the medical services I needed. Dr. Jimenez’s bedside manner helped me feel at ease after my previous PCP kept giving me the run around in getting the necessary referrals to get a life saving procedure. Whenever I’ve called their office, his staff has been extremely instrumental in getting me the earliest appointment available and submit the required referrals expeditiously. Thank you all again and continue the great work. Anyone would be lucky to have your team on their side.

text.text: I can’t thank this office enough for all their help in providing the medical services I needed. Thank you all again and continue the great work. Anyone would be lucky to have your team on their side.

originalText.text: This was my first time visiting Dr. Jimenez  and the service I received from Dr. Jimenez and his staff was excellent beyond words.  Both Dr. Jimenez and his staff were friendly,  professional, caring, and curiosity,  they made me feel at home from start to finish. Dr. Jimenez is so compassionate and easy to talk to, he took the time to listen and know me as a person and didn't rush me. I didn't wait no more than 5 minutes to be called in to be seen by the doctor.Dr. Jimenez welcomed me with open arms. He's  so awesome. Dr. Jimenez and staff are truly amazing.  I highly recommend Dr. Jimenez and his practice.

originalText.text: Was referred,Came here for the first time. The wait was a little longer than I would’ve liked but I was a new patient so it wasn’t that bad. The place is very welcoming, staff were really nice . The Doctor literally listen to every complaint I had and made me feel comfortable to express my complaints. Glad I picked this office as my PCP.

originalText.text: The best medical office I have visited, the service and care is the best I have been able to receive. The doctors and staff are an excellence and wonder. Thanks too them, I have managed to lose more than 20lbs. I am more than delighted.

text.text: The best medical office I have visited, the service and care is the best I have been able to receive. The doctors and staff are an excellence and wonder. Thanks too them, I have managed to lose more than 20lbs. I am more than delighted.

originalText.text: I don’t understand all the good reviews of this place. If I could leave a 0 start I would. This place is miserable. The staff looks sad and overworked. They look like they are doing their best but for some reason I always see new faces. If workers leave/get fired from a job so quick like they do here, I believe it’s because the environment is messed up. When the doctor sees me he is more concentrated on talking than my actual health. I’m not here to socialize I am here to get help.
